text: Shilanand Lakra (born 5 May 1999) is an Indian field hockey player who plays as a forward for the Indian national team. He made his national debut during the 2018 Sultan Azlan Shah Cup. He had previously played for the national junior team which won the bronze medal at the 2017 Sultan of Johor Cup. He was the top goalscorer at the 2019 Sultan of Johor Cup with five goals. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sundergarh district Category:Field hockey players from Odisha Category:Indian male field hockey players Category:Male field hockey forwards
title: Shilanand Lakra
